TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileGroupBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供群組 ASP.NET 設定檔屬性值的不具型別存取。

span.span: Provides untyped access to grouped ASP.NET profile property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 用來建立群組中的屬性類別是屬性目前。The class is used by ASP.NET to create grouped properties in the property for the current . 當屬性指定為一組屬性使用[群組設定檔 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的內容項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e)，ASP.NET 會建立新的類別與群組中每一個屬性的強型別存取子。When properties are specified as a group of properties using the [group Element for properties for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e), ASP.NET creates a new class with strongly typed accessors for each property in the group. 新的類別繼承基底類別。The new class inherits the base class. 新的類別呼叫的強型別存取子和方法基底類別，擷取和分別設定設定檔屬性值。The strongly typed accessors of the new class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 階段呼叫，來取得和設定屬性值的類別繼承類別提供給方法類別。The passes calls to get and set property values to the class that inherits the class that is supplied to the method of the class. 請參閱上行為、 例外狀況，以及其他更多資訊的類別。See the class for more information on behaviors, exceptions, and so on. 這個類別不是要從您的程式碼建立。This class is not intended to be created from your code. ## Examples 下列的 Web.config 檔會指定使用者設定檔，其中包含一組屬性的群組名稱為`Address`。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 針對產生的群組的屬性屬性的目前會加上群組名稱，例如`Profile.Address.Street`。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name, for example, `Profile.Address.Street`. 第二個範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，儲存和擷取設定的設定檔屬性。The second example shows an ASP.NET page that stores and retrieves the configured profile properties. ```xml ``` 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，會讀取並設定指定使用者設定檔的群組的屬性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 建立 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會使用類別來建立群組的屬性中屬性目前。ASP.NET uses the class to create grouped properties in the property for the current . 當屬性指定為一組屬性使用[群組設定檔 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的內容項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e)項目，ASP.NET 會建立新的類別具有群組中每一個屬性的強型別存取子。When properties are specified as a group of properties using the [group Element for properties for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4e3672f-9653-4034-a178-fb358b02730e) element, ASP.NET creates a new class with strongly typed accessors for each property in the group. 新的類別繼承基底類別。The new class inherits the base class. 這個類別不是要從您的程式碼建立。This class is not intended to be created from your code. ## Examples 下列的 Web.config 檔會指定使用者設定檔，其中包含一組屬性的群組名稱為`Address`。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 針對產生的群組的屬性屬性的目前會加上群組名稱，例如`Profile.Address.Street`。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name, for example, `Profile.Address.Street`. ``` ``` 下列 ASP.NET 網頁讀取，並設定指定使用者設定檔的群組的屬性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

.method public hidebysig instance object GetPropertyValue(string propertyName) cil managed
Public Function GetPropertyValue (propertyName As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetPropertyValue(System::String ^ propertyName);

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 群組設定檔屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the grouped profile property.

summary.span: 取得群組設定檔屬性的值。

span.span: Gets the value of a grouped profile property.

returns.span: 型別為 的群組設定檔屬性值。

span.span: The value of the grouped profile property typed as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會使用類別來建立使用者設定檔的類別。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，會建立新的類別類型的`ProfileCommon`，後者繼承自類別。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 強型別存取子會加入至`ProfileCommon`每個群組和屬性中定義的類別[profile 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)組態區段。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each group and property defined in the [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd) configuration section. 強型別存取子`ProfileCommon`類別呼叫方法來擷取不具類型的值從產生的存取子，然後將轉換成指定的型別並傳回做為群組的屬性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to retrieve untyped values from the that the generated accessor then casts as the specified type and returns as the grouped property value. 您可以使用依名稱擷取您的應用程式的使用者設定檔群組的屬性值的方法。You can use the method to retrieve grouped property values of the user profile for your application by name. 傳回的值的型別為`object`，而且必須轉換為擷取時的特定物件類型。Returned values are typed as `object` and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 強型別存取設定檔屬性值，您可以存取的群組的屬性名稱的群組成員身分屬性，例如`Profile.Address.City`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the grouped property by name as a member of a group of the property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，會讀取並設定指定使用者設定檔的群組的屬性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. 如範例 Web.config 檔案中指定群組的使用者設定檔的內容，請參閱所提供的範例類別。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies grouped properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來擷取或設定應用程式的使用者設定檔群組的屬性值。You can use this property to retrieve or set grouped property values of the user profile for your application. 傳回的值的型別為，而且必須轉換為擷取時的特定物件類型。Returned values are typed as and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 強型別存取設定檔屬性值，您可以存取的屬性名稱的群組成員身分屬性，例如`Profile.Address.City`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of a group of the property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，會讀取並設定指定使用者設定檔的群組的屬性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. 如需指定一組屬性的設定檔中的 Web.config 檔案的範例，請參閱所提供的範例類別。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies a group of properties in the profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會使用類別來建立使用者設定檔所使用的類別。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，會建立新的類別類型的`ProfileCommon`，後者繼承自類別。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 強型別存取子會加入至`ProfileCommon`每個群組和屬性中定義的類別[profile 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)組態區段。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each group and property defined in the [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd) configuration section. 強型別存取子`ProfileCommon`類別呼叫方法以傳遞分組的屬性值來儲存在資料來源。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to pass grouped property values to the to be stored at the data source. 您可以使用方法，以將值指派給依您的應用程式的使用者設定檔的屬性名稱來分組。You can use the method to assign values to grouped properties of the user profile for your application by name. 值的型別為`object,`和型別檢查都是在執行階段，不會編譯時間。Values are typed as `object,` and type checking will be done at run time, not compile time. 強型別存取設定檔屬性值，您可以存取的群組的屬性名稱的群組成員身分屬性，例如`Profile.Address.City`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the grouped property by name as a member of a group of the property, for example, `Profile.Address.City`. ## Examples 下列 ASP.NET 網頁讀取，並設定指定使用者設定檔的群組的屬性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. 如範例 Web.config 檔案中指定群組的使用者設定檔的內容，請參閱所提供的範例類別。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies grouped properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
